title: Pippa passes = The Song of conscience
brief_description: Pippa’s singing it seems, has a magical healing effect on those who cross her path. Based on a Robert Browning poem, “Pippa Passes” has a time-based four-part structure and expressive simulation of early morning light. Cast includes Gertrude Robinson, George Nichols, Linda Arvidson, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
